modName: Skyrim High Definition LODs  - Vanilla volcanic area patch
summary:
I love the Skyrim High Definition LODs mod by AnarchoArchitect.
But the volcanic area is based in the Vivid Landscapes mod, and I don't use it, causing a color mismatch between the lod and the full loaded vanilla textures.
This patch will fix that.
descriptionHtml:
[b]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Skyrim High Definition LODs - Vanilla volcanic area patch v0.2
By Xtudo
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/b]

Description
===========
I love the Skyrim High Definition LODs mod by AnarchoArchitect.
But the volcanic area is based in the Vivid Landscapes mod, and I don't use it, causing a color mismatch between the lod and the full loaded vanilla textures.
This patch will fix that, see the screenshot for reference.
I did it for my game, and now I'm sharing it with the community, hoping it helps others.
It is based in the Dark and Grassy version.
Please, if you want, send me any suggestions.
Have fun!

ChangeLog
===========
Ver 0.2 - Added a missing spot 
            - Some minor fixes
Ver 0.1 - Release


Installation
=============
1. It's simples. 
Extract the downloaded RAR file, and copy the DATA folder to your Skyrim installation folder, overwrite.

Requeriments
=============
- Skyrim High Definition LODs mod by AnarchoArchitect
Here: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58818/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58818/?[/url]

Contact
=======
I am as Xtudo at TESNexus / SkyrimNexus.

Licensing/Legal
===============
- I don't give my permission to reupload this mod in any other sites.
- Thanks to AnarchoArchitect for his awesome work.
- Many thanks to Bethesda for making such a piece of art! I love you guys/gals! :D
author: Xtudo
